display_long_description:
👑 Claim the Throne of Ardania 👑
Build your town and rally independent heroes who explore, rest, and fight on their own. 
Complete handcrafted levels to unlock new challenges and expand your kingdom across the realm.

🏰 Build and Upgrade 🏰
Expand your territory, upgrade buildings, and watch your kingdom flourish under your guidance.

🧙 Guide Your Heroes 🧙
Your heroes act on their own. Set bounties and rewards to influence their actions as they take on quests and protect your land.

🐉 Defend Your Realm 🐉
Fend off monsters and powerful foes threatening to destroy your kingdom.

💰 Manage Your Economy 💰
Collect taxes, manage resources, and spend wisely to grow your kingdom.

⚡ Wield Powerful Magic ⚡
Cast powerful spells to influence battles and support your heroes when they need it most.

(🗣️ Pronounced: ar-DAY-nee-uhn Kingdoms)

📜 Disclaimer 📜
This project is a non-commercial fan tribute inspired by Majesty: The Fantasy Kingdom Sim. All rights to Majesty are owned by Paradox Interactive and their respective rights holders. This game is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or licensed by Paradox Interactive or the original creators in any way. 

💰 Cost 💰
This game will always be completely free to play.

🐛Bugs and suggestions 🐛
Feel free to leave thoughts down in the comments or in the Ardanian Kingdoms discord server! https://discord.gg/5pJYCZyVRA
